# Enhance Underwriting Decisions with Accurate Loss Run Insights
Pibit transforms loss run files into comprehensive reports with actionable insights, helping carriers and MGAs enhance underwriting efficiency and make better, more accurate decisions.
![Right Arrow](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/arrow-right.svg)
Request a Demo
![Flow Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/home/banner-image-v4.png)
Trusted by leading Carriers & MGAs
![HDVI Logo](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/hdvi-logo-v2.png)
![Highview Logo](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/highview-logo.png)
![Nomandy Logo](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/normandy-logo-v2.png)

![Shepherd Logo](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/shepherd-logo-v2.png)

![Method WorkerComm Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/method-logo-v2.png)
![Method WorkerComm Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/rms-logo-v2.png)
Gain deep insights through our comprehensive loss run report
### Loss Summaries
Access a detailed summary of policy history to understand loss trends and guide your underwriting choices.
![Right Arrow](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/arrow-right.svg)
Book a Demo
![Underwriting Inefficiences Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/home/loss-summaries-graph.png)
![Slow Quote Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/home/indepth-acc-insights-graph.png)
### In-Depth Account Insights
Leverage in-depth insights to make informed decisions and reduce risk:
**Claim Severity:** Assess claim severity by viewing loss distributions and categorizing claims into specific ranges.
**Carrier Loyalty:** Analyze customer loyalty by examining coverage history with each carrier.
**Delayed Claims:** Identify claims reported significantly later than expected.
**Large Losses:** Easily identify and evaluate substantial losses that impact risk profile.
![Right Arrow](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/arrow-right.svg)
Book a Demo
### Identify Where and Why Losses Occur
Our language models categorize coverage and accident descriptions, enabling precise risk assessment and helping you:
**Track coverage-specific losses:** Assess where losses occur across coverages and uncover coverages that are most affected.
**Spot accident trends:** Differentiate between recurring incidents and one-off isolated events to better assess risk.
![Right Arrow](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/icons/arrow-right.svg)
Book a Demo
![Underwriting Inefficiences Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/home/identify-loss-occur-v2.png)
Don't just take our word for it – Hear from our clients
![Review Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/client-reviews/Michaela-Morrison-v2.png)
Integrating Pibit.ai's loss run analysis improved our submission process, helping our team advance from assistants to underwriters.
Michaela Morrison
SVP Operations
Method Workers' Comp
![Review Image](https://d359yxwk2f1nzv.cloudfront.net/media-cdn/common/client-reviews/Danil-Kolesnikov.png)
Pibit.ai increased our underwriting efficiency by processing every carrier format loss run seamlessly, including complex cases. A must for any MGAs.
Danil Kolesnikov
Founding Engineer
Shepherd Insurance

generated_description:
### Pibit.ai: Transforming the Commercial P&C Industry with LLM-Powered AI

Pibit.ai, founded in 2020 and hailing from Y Combinator's W21 batch, is on a mission to revolutionize the way the commercial property and casualty (P&C) insurance industry leverages data. Located in Palo Alto and staffed by a team of 30, the company specializes in transforming cumbersome loss run files into easy-to-understand reports packed with actionable insights. This innovation empowers carriers and Managing General Agents (MGAs) to enhance underwriting efficiency and make well-informed, precise decisions.

#### What They Do

Initially focusing on loss run files, Pibit.ai has expanded to provide a suite of solutions aimed at streamlining the underwriting process. Their platform enables users to:

- **Gain Loss Summaries**: By providing detailed summaries of policy history, clients can analyze loss trends to guide their underwriting strategies. 
- **Acquire In-Depth Insights**: The platform offers crucial insights like claim severity, carrier loyalty, and identification of delayed claims, allowing underwriters to make informed decisions and mitigate risk.
- **Identify Loss Patterns**: Pibit.ai utilizes advanced language models to categorize losses by coverage and accident descriptions, helping to highlight specific risk factors and trends.

The result? A smoother underwriting process that saves time and resources.

#### Client Trust and Feedback

Pibit.ai is already trusted by major carriers and MGAs, who report significant improvements in their workflows. For instance, Michaela Morrison from Method Workers' Comp noted that the integration of Pibit.ai's loss run analysis transformed her team's role from assistants to fully capable underwriters. Danil Kolesnikov from Shepherd Insurance praised Pibit.ai for its ability to seamlessly process complex loss runs across various carrier formats, marking it essential for any MGA.

#### Investors and Recognition

Pibit.ai is backed by prominent investors, including Y Combinator, reflecting its innovative approach and potential in the insurtech landscape. The company is positioned at the intersection of generative AI and machine learning, making strides in a sector that's traditionally been slow to adopt advanced technologies.

### Conclusion

In summary, Pibit.ai is not just another tech company; it’s a game-changer in the P&C insurance space, harnessing the power of AI to drive efficiency and insight in underwriting. If you're interested in transforming how you approach underwriting, Pibit.ai offers a compelling solution. Consider booking a demo on their website at [pibit.ai](https://pibit.ai) to see how they can help you navigate the complexities of loss run files effectively.
